MTV's latest reality series follows newlyweds Travis Barker (drummer of Blink 182) and Shanna Moakler (former Miss USA) as they lead their far from average lives. With Travis' punk rock style and Shanna's all American beauty, these sweethearts are living proof that opposites really do attract. Travis and Shanna juggle the rock n' roll lifestyle, parenting and marital bliss all while keeping true to their free spirited ways.

A series that explores the environmental impact and origins of products we use in our everyday lives, hosted by eco-adventurer David de Rothschild. Among the items featured are cotton t-shirts, salmon, paper napkins and cell phones. Each half hour episode follows the life cycle of these items from production to disposal, showing viewers the ways in which they affect our health, environment, and society.

A talk show pilot hosted by A&E's Bill Kurtis. The series brings famous historical figures such as Cleopatra, Napoleon, and Lincoln back to life for a live interview in front of a studio audience, supported by "documentary" footage created for the show.
A behind the scenes reality series following the rock band OKGO and the making of their innovative "Last Leaf" music video which was made possible by funding from Samsung.

The South Silly Kids sample local sweets and treats from Artisan Boulanger Patissier, D'Emilio's Ice Treats, and Rim Cafe, Mike DeMayo teaches us how to change a pedal, and Hooded Leaders play Old Swedes' cemetery. Intro animation by Michael Burke.

Sixteen beautiful yet fierce fighting women trade their comfortable lives to compete and train with the best MMA fighters in the world and put their new skills to a test in a brutal environment of becoming the new "Ultimate Womens Combat Champion".

Diamond in the Ruff is a South African model search reality show. The show features a cast of judges and fairy godmothers - experts in the beauty, magazine and modeling industry- who combined forces to groom 15 young women from inexperienced candidates into accomplished models. The candidates were both plus and slim models. The castings took place across 8 South African towns and cities.

You've seen those other home video shows. Now get ready for some bizarre, sick and twisted home videos - The kind of stuff you'd NEVER see on primetime TV What these folks do in front of the camera will shock your socks off. You'll laugh - You'll cry - You'll puke! So sit back and relax and enjoy AMERICA'S SICKEST HOME VIDEOS.

"People' s Choice Awards" - American award, that is awarded to the figures of pop culture on results the spectator voting. Handed annually, since 1975. 2005 to of winner in each of nominations found out by means of the sociological questioning, and then voting was organized in the Internet.

What Women Really Want from Sex, Money, Relationships, and more it's all in this show. Mayweather Live speaks with three completely different types of ladies and gives you the inside scoop about what Women Really Want and what they don't like at all.

Bill and the guys customize a brand new 2017 F350 with less than 600 miles on it. They lower it with their handmade air ride and add a one-of-a-kind gooseneck hitch. The owner of a 2014 Porsche 911 wants her sports car to sound as good as it looks.

War of Rock is a grassroots effort comprised of musicians, music industry leaders, professional actors and fans. A TV reality show focusing on education and preserving the rich history and evolution of and to help gain more interest in Rock and Roll while promoting new and upcoming talent.

TRU Talent is a Canadian reality television series. It is a talent show that features singers, dancers, magicians, comedians, and other performers. Among its significant features is that it gives viewers the unique opportunity to interact throughout the show. This show was created by Steven Binko, Marty Doucet, and Paolino Caputo.

Joe Zee - Creative Director for Elle - is always one step ahead of the trends. Now, Joe is using his style smarts and eye for detail to guide struggling fashion designers back on the road to success. With insider savvy, a positive spirit, and a double dose of tough love, Joe inspires these listless labels to rekindle their creative fire and stay true to who they are. This just may be their last chance to transform cutting room concepts into rack ready fashions.

Follows the adventures of two couples that have swapped homes, cars, friends, favorite restaurants and culinary tastes for their vacation. From the moment they arrive in their new home away from home, the traders will be challenged with a list of tips and tasks created for them by each other with one goal - to give the visiting couple a true insider's perspective on the best, the wildest, and the most awe-inspiring facets of their hometown.

"My Life As Harrison" takes a look at Harrison James as he leads his path to success. When his acting career steps into motion their will be drama, good-times, and bad-times. Watchers' will be accessed into Harrison's life, this reality-series will be released in December 2017.

Wild Ones- Who is the King? TV series finds inspiration in the rhythms of nature as shown through the wonders of the animal kingdom. It explores different aspects of animal behavior, including hunting techniques and feeding habits, family relationships and defense mechanisms, courtship and mating rituals.

The family faces off in the Mann Family Games, and this year David Jr. is determined to dethrone his dad and become the Mann of the House, but first he must contend with his sister, Tiffany, who has a major problem with him that could to ruin the event.

David is forced to make one of the toughest decision of his life when a dater from his past comes back and the remaining five women give him a "her or us" ultimatum. Vanessa is falling for several of the guys, but she is disappointed when one of the daters returns from a long trip without the same spark. Will she say goodbye for good, or give him a second chance?

Show in four half-hour episodes, the series shows how the lives of young people living in the four extremes of Săo Paulo: North Zone, South, East and West. Every program, a specific region of the city is explored through the eyes of local characters who tell their life stories in these places.

Cindy Stumpo is one of Boston's best luxury home builders. And even with the recession in full swing, she's as busy as ever. When her broker tells her the time is right to list her 90 Brookline property, Cindy and her team race against the clock to finish construction in time for a broker's Open House. But between managing her crew, dealing with her ex-husband, and training her daughter to one day take over the business, Cindy has got her work cut out for her.

Tribble Reese has decided to give love another chance. He will be faced with the tough decision of city versus country in the search for his Ms. Right, choosing between girls from all across the country who are heading to Alabama to help mend his broken heart.

Hosted by Capt. Jose Wejebe, a Floridian and native Cuban, the show takes viewers on the fishing trips of a lifetime to some of Florida and Latin America's most picturesque locations. These exotic locales, which are home not only to some of the most beautiful scenery and saltwater destinations, but also to some of the most beautiful fish, will surely inspire any aspiring angler to take a trip of their own.

Follow Tony Makris, legislative and PR strategist by day and outdoor enthusiast by night, as he takes outdoor fans on an adventure across the splendor and mystery of Africa. Tony and notable celebrities go on excursions across Africa's most dangerous and notorious regions in search of big game hunting and trophies.

A team of skilled, and sometimes unskilled, labourers, designers and contractors go up against the clock to give a house a themed remodelling. Other than picking the theme, the owners have no say in the design process. Hilarity ensues when builders clash, problems arise and the five day time limit looms. Awesome designs create out of the ordinary houses that inspire and leave nothing to the imagination.

What would you do with the chance to put reality on hold? Would you risk everything you have and know for the adventure of a lifetime? For 3 complete strangers, an epic journey is about to begin where they'll find out what living is truly all about.

Busking is the practice of performing in public places for tips and gratuities. People engaging in this practice are called buskers or street performers. Buskers is a one-hour hosted series that goes around the world, past the boardwalks and cityscapes to find out who these people are and what motivates them to live out their lives on the streets of the world.

"Dario Undiscovered" is an empowering and inspiring reality show in which this aspiring star and lovable personality not only invited fans and viewers to come along on his musical journey, but also reveals his candid off stage life. You'll meet his closest friends and primary support system the effervescent Lisette, Kia, and Teisha as well as his various business connections through interviews, confessions and uncensored day to day encounters.

Door Knockers features home improvement intervention. In each episode, unsuspecting homeowners get a knock on their front door, and before they know it, a crew of contractors is bringing out the power tools and doing on-the-spot transformations. With plenty of surprises along the way, and no shortage of do-it-yourself makeover madness, these people get an opportunity to change their home with a knock on their door.

A small number of men and women are stranded on two islands in the South Pacific. They must build their own shelter, but food and supplies are provided. Each week a new person arrives and spends three days on each island. On the seventh day they must choose which island they prefer to live on for the rest of the game. At the end of the contest the island with the most inhabitants wins a cash prize.

Enter a world where the hunter becomes the hunted, and a split-second decision means the difference between life and death. 'Deadliest Hunts' takes you along on heart-pounding hunts for the planet's most fearsome beasts: elephant, cape buffalo, leopard, brown bear and many others. Join these intrepid hunters as they travel to some of the world's most exotic locations to pursue its deadliest predators.

The series is a humorous and educational fishing series led by Fish Fishburne, one of the most respected and entertaining celebrities in the bass fishing world. Fishburne, travels to the most famous bass lakes in the U.S., performing unbelievable fishing stunts and teaching viewers a thing or two from his 12 years as a professional bass angler.

Stunt Academy is a reality competition television show that will take 24 prospective stuntmen and women behind the veil of the stunt world, and teach them the secrets and techniques needed to be a professional stunt professional. This series of physical and mental challenges will determine who will become the next professional Stuntman and Stuntwoman.

CMT Road Pranks is a one-hour special highlighting the hilarious practical jokes artists create while out on the road. Join Jewel, Ty Murray, Sara Evans, Chuck Wicks, .38 Special and others as they all try to pull off incredible hidden-camera pranks.

Welcome to Bowling Green,Kentucky - home to the National Corvette Museum, The Historic Railpark and Train Museum, and headquarters for the Fruit of the Loom underwear and clothing company...just to name a few places of note. It's also known for its King-of-RedNeck-Real Estate...Edgar Mills otherwise known as Big EZ. This larger-than-life swaggering businessman owns most of the real estate in town including a liquor store, a Laundromat and a whole heap of homes in varying degrees of condition.

Have you ever come across a person who has a story that is so amazing, so unbelievable, that you cannot believe it is true? A story that defies all reason and commonsense? A story that's so implausible it surely must be a lie. Or could it be a story that can only be explained by, perhaps, Divine Intervention? Well, let's find out.

Three international beauties, Annmarie, Annmarie, and Sandra fly to the United States twice a year from their country, Lebanon, shopping for fashionable apparel for their luxury boutique in Lebanon, the Annmarie Outlet and to visit their cousin, TV personality Joseph Azarian (The Real With Joseph Azarian) and his family.

The Jennifer Lopez dancers face challenges in Asia with torrential rain and illness and Muslim customs force a quick wardrobe change in Jakarta. George returns from his baby's birth, even more determined to nail his first show and Shannon leads the dancers to some well-earned R&R in his Australian homeland.

There are more than 2 million people in Chicago of Polish descent and more Poles in Chicago than in Warsaw. More than 10 million ethnic Poles in the United States. This shows follows two multigenerational Polish families as they deal with marriage, divorce, single life, relationships, financial success, financial failures, partying hard, living life to its fullest, and the common bonds that keep their families and friendships together.

The boys are back and betting at the beach. They take on the waves to discover who the better surfer is for a meager $5000. Phil and Antonio also bet on who the better beggar is and also try their hand at scouting basketball and poker players.

On Finding Fido, canine expert and photographer Seth Casteel helps an enthusiastic dog owner-to-be find his or her perfect companion. Whether it's a sociable dog that can help owners overcome shyness, an active dog that encourages exercise, or even a dog that can help detect the onset of an owner's epileptic seizure, Casteel matches each participant's specialized needs and criteria to his or her new best friend.

Hosted by Gregg Ritz, a world renowned muzzle loading expert and big buck authority, this show follows the industry's most accomplished hunters on their adrenaline-filled pursuits. The show takes viewers on an adrenaline-filled ride to all compass points, from Midwestern whitetail stands to the African dark continent, to pursue big game in extreme conditions. It's a must-see for hunters of all ages.

A competition series featuring 12 aspiring bounty hunters who risk life and limb to chase down actual fugitives for their first time. Spike ordered 10 episodes of the series, which eliminates those who don't catch the most fugitives. The ultimate winner will win a position with a prominent bail bond and fugitive recovery agency.

Hollywood's Hot List is a fast paced half hour countdown clip show that features the most exclusive celebrity photos and footage in the world. Each exciting episode centers on a different theme such as: "Hottest Celebrity Bodies","Celebrities Gone Wild" or "Shocking Celebrity Breakups". Our countdowns entertain you, make you laugh and keep you wanting more!

With the changing cannabis culture in America, edibles are becoming more common. Bong Appétit is on the cutting edge of what is possible with cannabis. Bringing in some of the best chefs and infusing their creations with one of the greatest selections of cannabis on TV.

How many times has your love been put to test? To what extent will you go to rescue your partner? Channel[v] launches the biggest and the first ever romance - meets - adventure reality show - [v] Kidnap that will put the strength of your relationship to the test. We catch love struck couples put to test every moment that they have spent together. This thrilling show will test relationships while throwing a new twist at every corner.

Playground is simple. We take a venue and turn it into a make-shift recording studio. We add a band, an audience, and give them one goal - create a song together in an hour, and then record it in one take. This four part TV series follows the Playground team across four cities as they set out to produce a new show in each city, with a local band.

Niels arrives on the same steamboat that brought the saint from Spain, then joins the waiting families crowd. The mayor personally presides over a warm welcome, culminating in the balcony announcement of bad Flemish kids- actually, none at second sight. Interviews and flashbacks elaborate the boat trip and preparations. A new character is the weatherman.

Stallionaires brothers Real and Chance are back to traverse the wilderness in search of nature's legendary creatures (The Mega Shark, Big Foot, Hogzilla, The Chupacabrah). Each week they learn the tales of each quarry from locals and experts before embarking on their adventures. The legends are out there. Can these guys find them? Probably not, but it will be fun to watch them.

Join Murray Wasylnuk and Angela Charlotte Cheng as they set out around the globe, sampling local cuisines that range from mainstream, to the exotic. While exploring the unique traits of each destination, Angela, a certified personal trainer, will offer her tips to maintaining a healthy balance while away from home, including hiking through Taiwan to tandem biking around New York's famed Central Park and beyond. Are you ready to TRAVEL EAT FIT?

The Candy Bar is an iconic Soho drinking hole which attracts young hard-working lesbians searching for like-minded people who are looking for fun, laughter and love. This new reality show follows a group of London based lesbians attending the bar.

While today's young stars, athletes, and entrepreneurs all have different stories of how they became wealthy, they are all part of a club of young people who are so extraordinary that they are able to make millions of dollars before they can legally spend a dime on a drink. This profile looks at where these kids came from, how they have made their money, how they spend and manage their money, and where they are headed next after starting their careers with such early success.

Cake Lush is a show all about Greggy and his pursuit of making it in NYC. He came from CA to conquer NYC and has had many trials along the way. He has a super fun quirky and personality driven staff and we watch all of these characters personal and professional lives collide while trying to make it to the top from scratch.

Saltwater crocs outnumber Northern Territory residents. One man has already lost two fingers in the fight to catch and relocate these ancient predators. Can he and his team keep both populations safe? This unique 8 part documentary series follows the Northern Territories specialist Crocodile Management Unit. Filming the team during their busiest time of year, The Croc Catchers NT examines what life is like for Australia's most historic reptile, and the brave people who dare to control it.

Fast paced entertainment extravaganza with more than enough excitement for the whole family to enjoy. This high octane thrill ride will effortlessly blend reality and sports, into one of the most spectacular events in televised history.

Almost all snapper is over-fished, but Florida yellow snapper is abundant and sustainably harvested with a delicious buttery flesh and flavor. It's considered one of the finest fish in the world and fishing for it holds some major challenges for our intrepid chef.

After three spirited home builds as husband and wife, Bryan and Sarah Baeumler take on an entirely different relationship: boss and employee. In Bryan Inc., Sarah joins Bryan's busy construction company as a Project Manager and together they will buy, renovate and sell two luxury homes.

A school boy who fulfilled his dreams and became the caretaker of the school in which he attended when he was younger. Here he shows you his everyday lifestyle whilst being the caretaker, contains some strong language and scenes in which may distress some watchers.

"Heart Is Beating," also known as "Beating Hearts," is a new 2013 South Korean reality show that follows several celebrities as they undergo intense training in a dangerous profession. In this first installment, the celebrities endure rigorous training to learn to become real firefighters. The show stars popular actors Park Ki Woong, Jun Hye Bin, Lee Won Jong, Jo Dong Hyuk and other celebrities.

Pro quarterback, popular sports commentator and cooking enthusiast Matt Dunnigan spreads the love of flame broiled as he and his Road Grill team go in search of summer celebrations, where they prepare simple, delicious favorites on the Barbeque in front of a live audience. Matt's motto - have flame will travel!

America enthusiast Steve Watson crisscrosses the country playing with gadgets like the JetLev in Dania, Florida, where he'll walk on water and fly through the air, or Sandboard in Florence, Oregon where surfing meets snowboarding on the dunes.

On this episode of HOT ROD Unlimited, HOT ROD magazine heads to Pikes Peak in Colorado Springs for the 90th running of the world's most famous mountain race; the Pikes Peak International Hillclimb. We follow Jess Neal and Morgan Combes as they attempt to
Paul Provenza hosted this Nickelodeon show which simulated a court hearing with kids, and the jury would applaud to decide the verdict, decided by peak meters, named Judge O. Meter.

Identical twin brothers Scott & Chad Tomasso take their friendly sibling rivalry and charming whit on the road as they travel across the U.S. in search of the strangest and most unique bars and pubs this country has to offer. Hop on and take a ride on "The Great American Bar Crawl".

When an 18-year-old trying to smuggle cocaine in the lining of his suitcase is selected for a random baggage search, CBP officers find the narcotic seeping through cracks in his suitcase. Now they work to get him to cooperate and start naming names.

Marine contractor Jason Varney and his team are taking docks to the next level, creating custom deck spaces for clients who love their lakeside living. From traditional boathouses to sundecks and tricked-out living rooms with all the amenities, if you can dream it, Jason can build it.

The project centers on renowned tattoo expert Joey Germinario, aka Joey Tattoo, and his team of experts as they travel the country transforming failing tattoo studios into profitable businesses. In a reality TV-friendly twist, the New Jersey native will have to deal with a mix of belligerent owners, obstinate tattoo artists and shops with massive health code violations.

Guns In America is an hour long program that explores America's love affair with guns. Part of a five part series, the Gabriel Films was asked to present the side that supports the second Amendment in an effort to find common ground in a polarized nation where one side seeing guns as a symbol of violence, and the other as a bastion of individual freedom and defense.

A combination of live action and animation fuels this docuseries, which chronicles the journey of bounty hunter Akil Muhammad as he tracks and captures criminals in Los Angeles. The "modern day superhero" fights to keep his community safe from gangsters, murderers, rapists and those who seek to hurt innocent people. Wood Davis narrates.

Each Episode, Turning 21 producers will choose a male or female that has an up and coming Birthday that's turning 21, and is willing to go to pre picked destinations with 4 of their best friends to help celebrate it with them over a 3 day time span. The series presents their spontaneous, unscripted interactions with one another and other people they meet, as they are followed through the streets and clubs including of course the morning after.

Have you ever wondered why some animals have such crazy looking sense organs? Why do snakes have a split tongue? Why do elephants have such huge ears? Every feature has a special purpose that has evolved to ensure the survival of the animal. Just like us, animals rely on their senses to communicate with each other, to find their way around to find food and to stay safe.

Extreme Makeover for Spain. In each episode, a team of specialists that includes plastic surgeons, eye surgeons, stylists, dentists, psychologists and personal trainers, working with two people to become new people, both outside and inside.

The series follows amateur and professional couples from Australia, who have found a way to get rich quick. The couples buy homes, renovate and then sell them - all in just a few short weeks. But will it be a successful flip or a disastrous flop?

Diagnosed with cancer and against all odds a second chance presents itself. An opportunity to see the world. But it comes at the cost of everything. Is happiness worth the price of a lifetime of fortunes? This is a real story of a guy who gave up everything to travel the world with a backpack and a camera.

Steve wants a speed boat for his family to take to the lake on the weekend. He starts with Elvis gold records and hopes he can trade-up to it. Antonio decides to start with a laptop to see if can trade-up to something bigger and badder for a payday

James "Bucky" Buchanan is a well-known defense attorney in Las Vegas, Nevada. He defends all types with the help of his assistant Debbie. Las Vegas Law is a reality show with real criminals and real cases.

Bakers attempt three challenges each week trying to impress the judges enough to go through to the next round and eventually are crowned Romania's best amateur baker and earns a prize of 25,000 euro. In some episode local celebrities are invited and they ask contestants to bake special cakes.

Chef & culinary wizard, Graham Elliot, selects one up-and-coming chef for an once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to win a dream job at one of the best restaurants in the country. With only 36 hours and $3600, our up-and-comer must turn an unusual location into a full service restaurant and create a four star meal that will be judged harshly by some of the biggest chefs in the food industry. Will they impress the judges and earn a spot in one of their kitchens?

AWARD WINNER in several film festivals. DEVELOPMENT TV SERIES - The stories told in this program all have some connection with Jack the Ripper, who holds the best-known name given to an unidentified serial killer active in the largely impoverished areas in and around the Whitechapel district of London in 1888.

"The Big Gator" & "Spider Bites" are just some of the deep fried dishes Jim Stacy & fellow expert judges find when they go to Oklahoma City, OK. 6 of the regions best deep fryers compete in 3 rounds to take home the coveted Golden Corndog Trophy!

Plastic surgeons to Hollywood. Drs. Robert Rey and Jason Diamond are joined by Dr. David Amron, Dr. Kevin Sands, & Dr. Craig Ziering. Reality tv that follows the lives of four of the best plastic surgeons in Beverly Hills, from all the amazing work they do to family lives.

3 of the biggest rising stars in UK music are dumped in the middle of nowhere with only Ł20 in cash a BlackBerry Torch smartphone. One week later, they're billed to play an epic final gig at the other end of the country. Using the smartphone, they need to mobilise their fans to provide them with all of the food, transport and accommodation necessary to get them there... Broadcast in real time with daily 6-8 minute online episodes and as a weekly round up for Channel 4's T4.

A unique look at the hilarious family dynamic of the Winchell's, a family who made their dough in the Donut business. We'll watch as the rest of the family is ready to branch out and create their own successes in a multitude of different ways.

Jeff Corwin concludes his Alaskan adventure, traveling by flying boat to see Alaska's most impressive secrets. There he sees seals at the front of a glacier, a mooning moose and, most exciting, a rare marten. He tries his hand at fishing, failing to catch Kodiak Island king salmon.

Season 1 comes to a close, with three kid chefs battling it out for a $20,000 culinary scholarship and their own Web series. But to win, first they must impress _"Chopped" (2007)_ (qv) judges 'Scott Conant' (qv), 'Alex Guarnaschelli' (qv), 'Amanda Freitag' (qv) and 'Marcus Samuelsson' (qv).

A whole new group of unsuspecting smokers are brought together under the guise of being on a fantastic new reality adventure show, only to find out that their REAL adventure will be to live together and quit smoking Cold Turkey! This is season two of PaxTV's reality hit "Cold Turkey".

In two rape cases, one man pleads innocence whist the second admits to rape and murder. Mike Ware, Dallas Integrity Unit Chief face a dilemma - is it right for a guilty man to walk free whilst an innocent man remains incarcerated? In the second case, Craig Watkins, Dallas DA, faces his own dilemma by asking for the death penalty for another rapist and murderer.

In the pilot episode, Robb & Ryan, are presented with a unique challenge - to make a perfectly smooth & straight blade for Canada's only female sword swallower. One mistake means a whole lot of blood and guts, not to mention - it's bad for business.

KILL ARMAN is a 10-episode martial arts travel show. It tells the fish-out-of-water story of Arman Alizad, an average man in his mid 30s who is lazy, out of shape and loves his cozy life. Arman has no previous martial arts experience. He now has only six months to train before facing the ultimate challenge: battling 10 warriors of 10 different martial arts skills in 10 different countries around the world, with only his martial arts skills to protect him.

A stereoscopic 3D special from InDemand which allows viewers to sit in the audience and go behind the scenes of some of the hottest shows now appearing on Broadway. The special includes stunning numbers from musicals including Spiderman and Anything Goes.

Intermediate comics are watched and a winner is chosen by a panel of well-known comics to perform at a top-tiered club. The home audience votes for their favorite panelist via Twitter and the winning panelist returns to the following week's show.

Property Brothers' Drew and Jonathan Scott travel to Highwood, Ill., and Keene, N.H., to take in two small-town pumpkin festivals. There, the brothers will go head-to-head as they help the cities battle to see which can carve and display the most lit jack-o'-lanterns and set a new Guinness World Record in the process.

Honoring achievements, both artistic and technical in nature, throughout a variety of television genres, guest performances in a weekly television series, and outstanding accomplishments in the fields of animation, reality and documentaries.

The Boss is like no other chef he is strait out of the hood! Watch him sauté, grill and fry to hip hop beats as well as interact with traders at the local markets in Manila always with his side kick monkey by his side . Chef Bruce is not only in control of his kitchen, but is the undisputed authority when it comes to cuisine, leaving the audience with little doubt that he is indeed "The Boss"!

Housing 101 is a documentary-reality TV series that follows host Wahab Alshehri as he journeys through the United States of America meeting some of Saudi Arabia's elite students. These students guide us as they share their school experience and living lifestyle.

Popular actor and sustainable living activist Adrian Grenier, who's renovating a 1920's house in the historic, hip Los Feliz neighborhood, gathers green-conscious friends Angela Lindvall, Boise Thomas and Darren Moore to help make a stylish, earth-friendly difference in Los Angeles.

A reality quiz show where the contestants have to live in an isolated glass box in the middle of Dublin, Ireland. During the day the two contestants will work together to build up a pot of money and every might they will battle against each other, live on television, to see who gets to keep it.

Victor Antonio (motivational speaker) pays a visit to individuals struggling with their finances. Through a takeover of four days Victor teaches money sense. 90 days later Victor catches up with the couple to see what changes have been implemented and reviews the status of goals.

Eco-living can be economical, fun, and functional in the LIME Original Series, Simply Green with Danny Seo. Danny's mission is to show you how everyday choices in your home have an impact on our planet. Simply Green is a hip and modern take on the classic reuse, reduce, recycle rules, with simple but stylish ideas for going green!

App developers must pitch their creation to four advisors in hope to partner with one of them for six weeks. After which they get a chance to earn a share of over ten million dollars in venture capital investment and featured placement on the app store.

In order to make a killer music video for G Fella's new song, the crew needs an airplane. Cousin Ralphie and Cousin Anthony "got a guy." Now it's just a matter of getting "him" to lend G his plane. Meantime, the Three Kings tell G he needs to show signs of success or they will cut off his funding.

Kelley and OPRI investigate Watson's Mill in Manotick, Ontario. Watson's Mill was opened in 1860 and the wife of co founder Joseph Currier was killed in an unfortunate accident in 1861. To this day the mill has almost daily reports of paranormal activity.

Take Back TV was a live concert event from Current TV, champion of user-created television content. The concert commented about freedom of expression with musical artists, special celebrity guests, dancers, representatives from the Current TV station, and more.

Series digs deep to discover how some of our favorite places and attractions came to be and why they keep wowing visitors today. Viewers will come to expect the unexpected as they are surprised with fascinating revelations about popular destinations they thought they knew well.

14 contestants are competing for a grand prize, every episode of the 13 episodes of Elmashrou3 one contestant leave after the episode, the challenges are team based until the semi-finals episodes (11th), when they are competing as individuals only.

Home and Castle TV is a local entertainment magazine show focusing on Suncoast real estate, lifestyle and high profile celebrities/residents. It's a unique combination between "Millionaire Listings," "HGTV" and "Lifestyle's of the Rich and Famous." Viewers will come away more educated and fascinated regarding topics such as "Living in Style," deals in the "Luxury Market Place," "Home Improvement" and hidden "Luxury Escapes."

Hosted by fashion influencer Mallory Ervin, "How to Wear" takes viewers on a fun, playful, and accessible fashion journey, teaching fans how to recreate the looks and trends of favorite country lifestyle celebrities from the glamorous red carpet to the sold-out concert stage to everyday popular street style.

'The Office Temps' is a hidden camera series that takes a hilarious look into the world of temporary employment. Unwitting Temps are hired at staged work environments where their co-workers are actually actors following scripted scenarios that escalate into unbelievable comedic storylines.

Cortney & Bob head to snowy Mammoth, California where they meet their client, legendary skateboarder Tony Hawk, on the top of a mountain. Tony may be the master of vertical skateboarding, but his '70s ski lodge is woefully outdated and in desperate need of the Novogratz touch. The Novogratzes decide to give Tony a chic boutique resort feel and to emphasize family in the design.

After scouting Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, Northern New Jersey and New York for outstanding home cooks, Bobby Flay chooses three teams per city to compete against each other to be crowned their city's best. Using their home-grown kitchen skills and creativity, each team has a limited budget and three hours to turn a secret theme into a spectacular three-course dinner party for Bobby, their competitors and special guests.

Dirty 30 will explore how HIV and AIDS is effecting our world today. 2013 marks 30 years since the identification of HIV. Although you can't discuss HIV and AIDS today without discussing the challenges in Africa, Dirty 30 is adding the United States back into the conversation. In addition to health care and statistics, our aim is to shine a light on the psyche surrounding HIV and AIDS in the U.S. and abroad.

Teams of three will solve problems while racing across deserts, over mountains and through rivers. Each week a new stage of the expedition will be revealed. After ten stunning legs of competition, one team will cross the finish line first to claim victory.

Spin-off from the show Flipping Out, The show features Jeff Lewis and Jenni Pulos visiting the homes of clients and staying with them while a renovation takes place. As well as redecorating, Lewis attempts to rectify problems with his clients' relationships.
In this first semi-final round, each competitor must make the perfect appetizer, entree, and dessert in a set amount of time to impress our judges in order to move forward to the final.

Dropout Pvt. Ltd. turns the spotlight on a bunch of under-qualified underdogs, or shall we say the square pegs who just don't fit in the round holes?. What happens when these so-called 'rejects' face the biggest real-world business challenges? Can their dreams survive the harshest reality check ever?

Four typical fourteen year old boys take part in four weeks of life coaching during the summer. With the help of life coach Kate Marlow the boys are taught new skills to help them become more confident, better behaved at school and more appealing to the opposite sex.

Follows the road to the crowning of the AWA World Champion, beginning with the four Whitetail Pro Series qualifying events. Unlike other hunting competitions, AWA events use advanced digital scope technology to record kills made with blank cartridges, rewarding hunters who take shots at mature whitetail deer.

In this very special episode of TV Guide Network's Hollywood 411, Adrianna Costa goes behind the scenes of NBC's break out show "The Event." Cast & crew divulge secrets about the exciting new series in exclusive interviews. We even reveal an action-packed scene from a future episode.

Cacau Oliver is an eccentric entrepreneur who makes a living in a very peculiar way: he creates celebrities. Every episode of "Celebrity Maker" will follow Cacau's amazing skills in creating fun, absurd stories to keep the attention of the press.

Follows a group of single, up-and-coming movers and shakers in New York's elite circles of real estate, fashion, and media. These ladies are aggressive in their pursuit of personal and career goals, but in this cutthroat world where egos are high and the drive to succeed is even higher, success can come at a steep cost.

This mini series is about things related to children ages up to 10 yrs of age and their parents. doing such things as arts, music, crafts, science projects, challenges, movement, talents , sharing , interaction, toy and candy reviews fan and birthday mail.in a reality setting.

"Ziemlich starke Frauen" - Fairly strong Women - goes along with six girls in wheelchairs (age 24-34) and shows their everyday challenges. This Tv series tells about their dreams and desires which are not so different from anyone elses, but need more imagination to be achieved.

Twiz and Tuck leave Brooklyn and hit the road to complete their bucket list. On their way Tuck drags Twiz to sleep in some weird ass places before meeting Paz the Michigan Monster and his Jiu Jitsu buddy Steve. They pick up the third companion of the trip, Bennie the puppy.

Hailey Duff hosts a reality show about 10 girls trying to become the next Elle Woods on Brodway in Legally Blonde The Musical at the Palace Theatre. They are judged by Bernard, Heather Hach, and Paul Canaan and face tough challenges every week. They travel along a hectic journey to follow in the footsteps of the amazing Laura Bell Bundy.

A husband injures his back while trying to build a new backyard fence to ensure the safety of his twin daughters. The Carefree Gardener steps in to create a safe play area for the girls, create a new space for outdoor entertainment, and beautify an unkempt landscape

When a police officer accidentally gets his unmarked car stripped at Country Auto, he leaves it behind for Terry and Danny Bob to fix. Meanwhile, Dirty Andy helps the officer investigate a stolen lawnmower, while getting on the cop's every last nerve.

Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson welcomes nine strangers as they move into an upscale Panamanian penthouse together, each with hopes of being crowned "The Hero." With up to a million dollars at stake, the contestants quickly realize that this will be no ordinary contest, as they must climb and hang from skyscrapers, navigate dark underground bunkers and face tough moral dilemmas.

A competition featuring masters of dance genres from Ireland, India, USA, Argentina, China, Russia, South Africa and Australia. Each team is comprised of two soloists, one duo and a larger group, all representing their country's best known dance forms.

Digg Into Books TV show, is a first-of-its-kind show that combines entertaining interviews with book clubs and authors from around the world. Viewers can get the latest scoop on everything hot related to the world of books. It provides a much needed platform to not only talk about the latest books on the market, but it also provides authors and book clubs with opportunities to connect with their readers and fans on a more personal and intimate level.

Chuey Martinez is on a quest to find America's tastiest pulled pork. His journey takes him to North Carolina for whole hog, to Louisiana for oven-roasted pork, to Kansas and Texas for pulled pork and slaw sandwiches, then finally to Colorado for the best carnitas Chuey has ever tasted!

'Mark Manguera' (qv) drives the King's Hawaiian food truck across the country, starting out in Los Angeles and heading towards the East Coast. Stops include Austin, Texas; Charleston, South Carolina; and New York City. where Mark experience local sites and eats regional classics.

Wannabe ghost hunters visit paranormal hot spots, unaware that they've been set up by loved ones to experience staged frightening encounters. In the series premiere, one paranormal enthusiast investigates the legend of the Headless Horseman, while another explores the ancient origins of America's Stonehenge in Salem, N.H.

Criss Angel BeLIEve is a show that aired on the Spike TV Network. It debuted in October 8, 2013 and is stylized much like Angel's previous show Mindfreak that aired on A&E Network. The show gives viewers unprecedented access into Angel's "Think Tank" and shows the creative process behind the illusions and demonstrations from conception to execution. It is centered on stunts and street magic acts by magician Criss Angel.

A wild look behind the scenes of the world's biggest DJ, Tiesto. We follow him and up and coming DJ's Don Diablo and Mike Williams as they travel the world playing to huge sold out shows. We will get a glance into the life of celebrity, fashion, triumph and disappointment as the DJ's go about becoming more and more popular. Go backstage into the dressing rooms and parties that fuel the lives of these superstars.

"The Cooking Lady" presents a healthy approach to Southern cooking. Ann Hollowell's buzzword around the set is "experimentation" and that's exactly what she loves to do: experiment with some of her favorite dishes to make them healthier and, in most cases, better.

Akonic Entertainment, Akon & Nickie Shapira's television production company from the United States, makes their way to the beautiful lands of the Democratic Republic of Congo to find their next superstar! We're looking for the best talent in all of the country as cameras fly to the major four provinces to find them! Who will it be?

The Unexplained Explained takes a look at ghost, spirits and psychics. Barb Powell is interviewed about speaking with spirits as a child, the repercussions of being a child psychic and the difference in adult years. A real live reading is done for an anonymous client explaining how psychic operate in real life. The pieces of the paranormal world that have gone unexplained are now explained in this episode.

Presenter 'Claire Sweeney (I)' (qv) and designer 'Derek Taylor (V)' (qv) manage a large team of painters, decorators and other workmen who invade, by invitation, a home and spend the next sixty minutes making changes to all the rooms to drag the home into the 21st century.

Children up to the age of 15 all across Canada audition for the chance to be the next star. This is a singing competition where they start by picking 16 kids across Canada. Afterwards they pick 8 from the 16 then 6 from the 8. These 6 contestants write their own songs and perform them to the judges. In the end one of these 6 young singers will become the next star.

Street Art Stories is an inspirational and in-depth 10-part documentary series. The stories behind the iconic, captivating, and most-Instagrammed urban murals and public art, narrated by the creators themselves, who are working to beautify cities across the world - one can of spray paint at time.

The Youth America Grand Prix is only a few weeks away and the hard work is underway. Sage, Madison, Andrea and Lex share what it's like to prepare for this fierce competition. In the studio, the dance teachers are working with their students for hours upon hours to ready them for the upcoming challenge.

Livin' Loud Nicky and entourage travels the country & embraces the energy of livin' life on the edge. Creating the largest movement ever seen in the underground scene. From convoys of cars by the hundreds to hosting americas hottest events around the nation, this entourage takes extreme to the max! Livin' Loud dosen't just develop party scenes. This crew will make history uniting entire cities week in and week out! The godfather of social networking is about to blow the doors wide open.

The top qualifying acts from each division will choose a rival and face off in a head-to-head elimination duel; the judges score each act based off their artistry, precision and athleticism; the top scoring acts move forward in the competition.

Secret Interview's unwitting candidates believe that they are filming a documentary about their workplace. In fact, they are about to have an interview for an amazing job without even realising it. Tested to their limits by a team of undercover actors intent on causing utter chaos, their prospective new boss, a giant of their industry, watches everything and judges their performance.

The Manager is a documentary-style series that follows three music managers in NYC. It explores the costs and benefits of managing some of the most successful artist in the music industry as well as the challenges of trying to break a new artist.

A resident is sitting on a functioning toilet on his front porch; a young visitor parks in a resident's parking space; two condo board members plan to make the association pay to upgrade their condo's air conditioning units; a woman is peeing in her condo's pool.

In 2011, the Creators (Mike and Jerry) declared to the Penny Arcade office that a reality show based on web comics must be done. After a year of research and a successful Kick starter stretch goal, the stage had been set for 12 Artists flown from around the world to compete a cash prize and a year integrated into the Penny Arcade machine. Through a variety of events and challenges, these 12 will fight, claw, write, and draw until only one Artist remains. Friends may or may not be made.

Equal parts video travelogue and pop-culture archaeological expedition, SECOND HAND STORIES reveals the passions and obsessions of Americans by taking a closer look at the second-hand stuff they buy, sell and collect and how it accumulates meaning along the way.

Full Metal Gasket features Megaw Contracts at silage, unique machines like the Claas Xerion operated by J.D.Townley & Son and the HiSpec Kompactor trailer designed by Tipperary based John Kennedy. The dairy enthusiasts can see the setup at Drumrammer Farms, operating the largest installation of Lely Astronaut robotic milkers in Ireland with a total of 8 machines fitted. Combine all that with Alwyn Young tackling a tough season of slurry spreading and you've got a jam packed disc of farming, facts and fun.

Produced in-house at MTV Canada, MTV CREEPS features a rotating panel of three, expert social media "creeps" (judges) that scrutinize the posts, pictures, and ultimately, the virtual lives of three, different social media addicts. Once each profile has been critiqued, the "creepers" decide whether to add, ignore or recommend their friends to remove them.

Psychic Cab is a half-hour series that takes their audience on a fun, transformative, compelling, inspirational, and highly entertaining ride. Psychic Cab was created by psychic so it delivers everyday passengers and our audience on an utterly unique psychic journey. Psychic Cab won't take you where you think you should go. We take you where you NEED to go.

Meet Elura and Michele, two-fast talking best friends from Staten Island. They might look like your ordinary housewives, but they happen to be former prosecutors who know how to tell it like it is. Everyone has a problem, and it turns out, Elura and Michele are pros at telling people what to do. Whether it's their crazy Staten Island families, or clients who pay for their mediation services, Elura and Michele are not afraid to get in the middle of things.

A former youth television host and six of his friends rent a mobile home, and tour Europe for two weeks. They travel through Germany, Belgium, France and Spain and experience The Tour of France, the Bull Runs in Pamplona, clubbing in Barcelona, skiing in Les Deux Alpes and the day of the Bastille in Cannes.

Kelly visits the Piedmont region of Italy for a holiday meal. Chef Frédéric Zahm of Louche Restaurant in Turin, Italy demonstrates how to make Brasatio, a classic Italian of beef braised in red wine. Don't forget a cheese plate for dessert.

Kari, Grant and Tory showcase 6 different escapes and rate them on three criteria: number of escapees, level of difficulty and time of freedom. It includes Pascal Payet's third jailbreak by helicopter, French military digging a tunnel out of a Nazi Camp during WWII.

Four former major league baseball players scour the hills and countryside of Latin America in search of undiscovered raw talent that will be selected and trained before competing in a knock-out competition to see who will become America's Next Top Baseball Player.

All Summer Long follows 6 college age men and women who are selected to be "The Underclassmen" through a rigorous application process designed to test their spiritual, emotional, and comedic mettle. After a two-week boot camp during which they develop together as missionaries and performers, "The Underclassmen" embark on the ultimate road trip, spending each week at a different camp, performing, counseling, and serving.

A reality series focusing on the daily pitfalls of a crew of airline workers trying to keep a major airport running smoothly. From lost baggage to delayed flights to unruly passengers these tireless workers face each problem with cool heads and common sense even as the pressure keeps mounting.

Rose Parade 2007 has stunning visual effects plus the best floats, equestrian units and bands in the world. Themed "Our Good Nature" with Star Wars' creator, George Lucas, as grand marshal, HGTV's live coverage once again makes it the best seat in the house!

Food Network star Jeff Mauro is eating his way across America... $24 at a time. From the West Coast to the Great Lakes to the Northeast, Jeff is on a mission to prove that eating great food doesn't have to break the bank. In each city, he'll set out to get breakfast, lunch, dinner and a snack ... all for under $24. Can he do it? Tune in to find out!

Matisse has trouble trying to get a date with Ashlee Simpson. So he's set for the very next best thing. Matisse is given the opportunity to date not one, but 6 die hard Ashlee Simpson Fans. Being put through different tasks, to figure out their strengths, he will decide which one will be My Own Ashlee Simpson.

Mundo em Movimento is a TV series that follows New York Times collaborator photographer Paula Lobo throughout the globe, as she researches and captures the typical dances of countries like India, Mexico, Japan, Puerto Rico, Turkey, Morocco, France, Spain and many others. Mundo em Movimento is the first reality series to explore the world of photography and dance in a dazzling mixture of classical and contemporary styles.

Docu-series following the creation of original musicals in New York City to be produced by High Schools around the country. Once completed, 5 high schools are selected to pilot the musical, and we see the vastly different processes, resources and perspectives from each school leading up to opening night.

Filmmaking wisdom through on-set demos, tours, and serious craftspeople talking shop. With Peter Bogdanovich, Irwin Winkler, Conrad Hall, Robert Evans, Ron Bass, Peter Gruber, Christian Bale, Bruce Sinofsky and Joe Berlinger, and many more.

Follows Mario Lopez his fiancée Courtney Mazza as they prepare for their perfect wedding. The network will join the couple as they navigate through the planning process, discover the perfect dress, and celebrate their love at their wedding with their family and friends.

Craig Perra, an international life coach for porn addicts and former porn addict himself, and Maddy O'Reilly, an award winning adult film actress go toe to toe in an intense eight-day battle debating the impact pornography has on relationships, children, men, and society as a whole.

Guru2Go is the entertaining, one-hour, weekly, television series for FitTV that demystifies the ancient art of yoga and instructs viewers on how to incorporate its time honored traditions and techniques into their daily lives to reduce stress and increase tranquility.

"The NEST Files" is a public access TV show, based on the New England Spiritual Team. They are a group of paranormal and historical investigators and researchers. They travel throughout the New England region, searching for claims of haunted locations, while researching, exploring, and investigating them to either back up the claims or correct any mistakes in history. They also like to interview local groups in the field, thus to learn from them and also get the chance to work alongside those groups, too.

The Drive follows seven minor league drivers -- two women and five men -- as they risk their money, their families and their lives for the opportunity to compete in America's most watched sport: NASCAR. The Drive puts you behind the wheel and inside the lives of a few determined men -- and women -- willing to give up everthing for their one shot at their ultimate dream.

For overweight chefs, working in the food industry is a double-edged sword. While indulging their love of food has brought them success, money and respect, it's also killing them. Each episode of Fat Chef features two such overweight food professionals and spends four months with them as they confront their food issues and, with the help of therapists, nutritionists and trainers defeat their abusive relationships with food and become healthy.

Marriage Boot Camp is turned upside down when reality TV's most notorious couples come knocking for help with their struggling relationship. Notorious troublemakers work out their partnership issues during extreme relationship therapy. Secrets, lies, fear and betrayal rule the house like never before, forcing Boot Camp Directors Jim & Elizabeth Carroll to pull out all the stops to save these relationships.

On your mark, get set, gorge. Take a fast paced tour of the city as Caroline Dumont finds three Ottawa restaurants that have a different spin on the same dish. From staples like burgers, pizza and poutine, to specialty options in vegetarian, seafood and small plates, Caroline finds something for every taste.

"Clicker's n' Chickers is a show that has 6 rounds of photoshoots in 6 different locations. Featuring 10 Models, 10 Photographers , and film crew. Every Model works with a photographer for approx 25 to 30 mins, then go change, then report to the next Photographer. This routine boosts the photographers and model's portfolio HUGE in one day!

A showdown of Cold War rivals pits the elite U.S. Navy SEALs against Spetsnaz, the Soviet Union's most notorious frontline unit. They both face a third "Rogue" force--Private Military Contractors, combat veterans who are now well-paid guns for hire.

We change looks and personalities: You have that decisive date and you are desperate: no fitting gear, no appropriate hairstyle no adequate makeup. This is a case for Superstyler in "Last Minute Styling". In six hours we will reinvent you and take you onto a journey that changes your life.

This topical, fashion-based talk show features two of Atlanta's style elite, celebrity hairstylists Derek J and Miss Lawrence, and New York's fashion maven and media socialite Bevy Smith. The trendy opinionated trio will cover anything and everything related to the world of fashion and beauty, from haute couture to celebrity style to unusual outfits from around the globe, giving their unique perspective on the trends, hits and misses.

Kirstie Alley leads a pretty interesting life. She was a Romulan-Vulcan officer in "Star Trek II," a sexy Emmy-winner as Rebecca Howe in "Cheers," the star of blockbuster films "Look Who's Talking" and "Drop Dead Gorgeous" and of course, her star turns in "Veronica's Closet" and "Fat Actress." For three decades Kirstie has been making headlines and staying in the forefront of the American conscience. Now, she's granting her fans unprecedented access inside her life...and what a life it is.

American Beauty Star consists of 12 competitors from all facets of the beauty industry, battling head-to-head in a series of intense challenges, from creating high-end magazine editorial looks to the hippest and most current red carpet styles for a Hollywood premiere. In the end, only one will become the next American Beauty Star.

Going Going Gone is a new series which adds a dramatic twist to home buying, improving and selling. Viewers will experience the tension, excitement and adrenaline of a property auction, along with the highs and lows of the auction room, the potential for success or failure ... delight or disappointment.

Mixing two of the most popular types of programs, real estate and travel - "A Place in the Sun" is a unique hybrid. Based on the hit U.K. show, "A Place in the Sun" fully immerses the viewer in each location to find out why it is a hot spot for those looking to buy abroad.

Twelve hours of unfiltered, uncensored chaos. Ten hosts from all different areas of the entertainment industry; stand ups, musicians, burlesque performers, actors & actresses, pod-casters, entertainers, and more. Adding more fuel to the fire, a ten hour race against time with TEN models being painted by one body painter. NO filters, NO do overs, NO room for error. Once the cameras start there's no stopping until the twelve hours are up.

Dermot O'Leary takes a behind the scenes look at the goings on in the UK's second season of Big Brother, featuring all the latest news, interviews with the housemates friends and family and co-presenters in the form of the evicted housemates.

Cigar Moguls is a documentary-reality series about the world of cigars. Narrated by Young Phan, a subject matter expert in the industry. Young and his assistant, Amanda McBride, travel the world visiting various cigar manufacturers, resorts, and take part in the cigar lifestyle. Exploring food, wine, spirits, and adventures with the people who are passionate about cigars, and the various ways to enjoy them.

Hungry? Then it's time to meet the California Dream Eater, a culinary connoisseur in search of dream eats across the state. The best part is, he's taking orders. Tell him what you dream of eating in California and he will hunt it down and eat it for you, right in front of your face. Because that's what dream eaters do.

For 60 years, the Alliance for Women in Media (formerly AWRT) has served as the voice and resource for women in the media. And for more than three decades, the Foundation has been a leader in celebrating and honoring programming created for women, by women and about women, as well as individuals who have made exemplary contributions to the industry. The Gracies strive to encourage the realistic and faceted portrayal of women in entertainment, commercials, news, features and other programs.

Dr. Drew, Giuliana Rancic and Orlando Jones host this celebration of the art of making a difference through movies and TV shows featuring Bradley Cooper, Denzel Washington, Jennifer Lawrence, Lucy Liu, Katey Sagal, Michael Cudlitz, Linda Cardellini, Ed O'Neill, Edie Falco, Mark Harmon and many others.

"Bar Rescue" heads "Back to the Bar" to check up on some of Jon Taffer's most challenging rescues. This "where are they now" special features never before seen footage of what happened after the "Bar Rescue" cameras left town. Taffer and his team follow the revisited bars through an evening shift, re-inspect the facilities for cleanliness and answer the question on every "Bar Rescue" fan's mind: "did they follow Jon's advice or not?"

Yasmin Dale is going to get married in a matter of eight weeks. This Australian reality television show based on the hit Scandinavian show Kerry's Getting Married, follows Yasmin as she goes through a series of dates to find the right man for her.

A new magazine-style series on DIY Network, in which co-hosts Amy Matthews and This Old House's Kevin O'Connor bring viewers inside homes across the U.S. that feature innovative building materials, techniques and gadgets. The best part: Kevin and Amy demonstrate how homeowners can make their homes smarter with the touch of their do-it-yourself buttons.

After telling Scott that he has never been able to have emotional intimacy with a woman, Doc Ali orders Scott to break off a long-term friends with benefits relationship with his friend Connie, then sends Scott with his friends to a cuddle party, where Scott learns from spooning with strangers that there is more to intimacy that just sex.

A seven-year-old infatuated with Michigan State memorabilia; a unique stash of Wolverine paraphernalia centering around the 1890s and early 1900s; and an unapologetic Iowa fan who furnished his own Hawkeyes nest in the middle of Cornhusker country.

Alongside fiery wife Allison (Apocalypse Meow), troubled friend Tracy (Agent Null) and an eclectic team of real-life superheroes, comic book artist turned real life superhero Illya King embarks on an inspiring journey of altruism while having a heck of a lot of fun doing it.

Three Bed & Breakfast owners stay in each other's accommodation, and then pay the amount which they thought their stay was worth. The owners with the highest percentage of or over their asking price wins. Much arguing and oneupmanship ensues.

"Saddle Up!" is a 10 part x 1 hour reality - soap series that follows the day-to-day trials and tribulations of ten business mavericks that attempt to survive life on a working ranch in the pursuit of becoming cowboys - but there's a twist! The series will track the unfolding friendships, the strain of real competition, high stakes, heated romance, mounting pressure and demanding challenges that are unique to the world of ranching.

In each episode of this game show that simulates what it would be like to be dropped into the middle of an adventure movie, four strangers receive a phone call inviting them to participate, and if they say yes, they're immediately thrust into a high-stakes labyrinth of suspense and intrigue with the chance to win up to $50,000.
The Dudesons want to become Native Americans so they go through seven rights of passages by the help of their Native American mentor named Saginaw.

The Road Less Traveled with John J. Pistone is a travel series that takes viewers on incredible journeys throughout the world. Whether traveling alone, with a significant other, a family or group of friends this series teaches viewers how to have amazing adventures on any budget and how to get off the beaten path and explore the "Road Less Traveled." Various television, film and music personalities accompany John on his travels.

John Barrowman meets pet owners and their pets as they face medical issues resulting in procedure and recovery. JB is devout animal lover who seems knowledgeable and does his best to make light of unfortunate situations.

Mysteries, Myths and Murders is a television show like no other. The show being produced by ThunderBall, will see British investigators and researchers, from all walks of life, investigate and research British Mysteries, Myths and Murders, from infamous true crime cases, to mysterious disappearances, strange creatures, and ghostly phenomena.

Series unveils the cutthroat world of Mrs. Pageants through the eyes of Victoria, Deborah, Jocelyn, Jennifer, and Jonella, five women, ages 30-52, who live in the greater Denver area. These women balance families, marriages, and careers while always prepared to compete in the next big pageant. On the stage, the ladies aim to carry themselves with grace, poise, and beauty but what goes on off stage, is an entirely different story.

Expert Child psychologist Laverne Antrobus meets families to help with problems in raising children.In episode five series three Laverne meets Jynine James (Charlie and the Chocolate Factory actress) mum to six year old Harrison and eleven year old Declan James.Laverne is ready to take on the challenge of a demanding six year old and to help Jynine stop his raging tantrums and demands.

Émission de télévision québécoise pour les jeunes diffusée de septembre 2005 ŕ avril 2009 sur VRAK.TV. animé par Stéphane Bellavance. Elle a pour objet de redécorer complčtement une pičce choisie par le participant de la semaine (généralement sa chambre ŕ coucher), lequel est choisi parmi les téléspectateurs ayant soumis leur candidature.

In the premiere episode, Adam Richman travels to Daytona, FL to join 200,000 passionate NASCAR fans in the legendary infield for the 55th running of the Daytona 500 to experience their ingenious tailgating and culinary creations first-hand.

The program focuses on the scientific evidence for UFOs and ETs, paranormal phenomena, cryptozoological entities, weird crime, bizarre medicine, strange people and anything else of an unusual and fascinating nature. It is a combination of fascinating field reports and intriguing in-studio presentations.

Host David Keystone had a great time watching guest chefs cook up a storm on YTV's Cook'd. Now it's his turn to be in the hot seat. David will attempt to cook the winning dishes from the show. With no recipe or help, will his dishes end up tasting as good as the dishes made by the cooks on the show?

A group of holiday makers join Brendan Sheerin on his coach travelling on the road to Marbella. The cast take on a activities throughout the day while travelling. Every night a couple is voted off and new couples are introduced along the way. Who will make it to Marbella?

Wild wing CEO Rick Smiciklas goes under cover at various locations to learn how to improve the bottom line as some passed financial problems and misfires. He finds inconsistencies, good employees, and for the first time in "Undercover Boss Canada' an under cover boss loses it and rips into somebody.

Carmel Joy Baird is a wife, mother of six, grandmother of three and she speaks to dead people! This reality show takes you through an average day in the life of this very gifted medium who not only gives incredible in depth readings and emotionally healing messages to her clients but also manages to run a busy household,a farm, two dogs, horses and her impetuous children as well as a husband who pulls some truly outrageous antics.

India's Deadliest Roads is part of the Ice Road Truckers series, a reality TV show that depicts how drivers take their vehicles across daunting journeys, in places like Alaska. Mandira Bedi, Sangram Singh & Varun Sharma will be the part of this in its Indian version.

Follow John (Janusz), a veteran truck driver on his journeys throughout the United States of America. He will face the heat in the west, severe storms in the mid-west, and the cruel winters of the east all while delivering the goods which keep America running. What issues lay ahead? Where will the road lead him? Find out on Trucking Thru America.

The Art Of explores everything Pure Leaf Tea. Tea Expert Alex White travels to the Dewata Tea Estate in Indonesia where we see the delicate process of tea production, from picking, to drying, to brewing. Finally, Alex puts his expertise to work as he explains the intricate skill of tea tasting.

Viewers take a comedic peek behind the scenes of what food and beverage retailers have to deal with when it comes to the constant threat of theft, as professional security experts Scott McDonald and Connie Ribble expose internal flaws and offer advice on how to prevent future loss. American businesses have over 25 million dollars in theft every day, but this dynamic duo have made it their mission to put an end to thievery, one store at a time.

A girlfriend goes topless after getting doublecrossed on her prank attempt... a roommate is fooled into rubbing Icy Hot cream on his junk... a kid thinks he's getting a stripper for his eighteenth birthday, but it's just one of his guy friends in drag...

Niecy Nash is getting married. Follow the beautiful bride as she plans and prepares for her wedding to Jay Tucker. Whether it's choosing her wedding gown, the bachelorette party or her wedding ceremony to everything in between the fun and excitement never ends for Niecy.

This new docu-series exposes the true lives of Hawaii's most influential surfers on Oahu's North Shore. Known as "The Wolfpak", this crew of locals takes charge of Pipeline and teaches outsiders the rules of engagement in surfing one of the world's heaviest breaks.

The search for Ireland's next style star. 10 aspiring stylists, designers and fashion buyers battle it out a senior creative role with Aurora Fashions and a design contract with ByCaprice lingerie. Tasks ranged from window dressing to personal styling, advertorials to catwalk shows, photo shoots to dress design. Part advertiser-funded, sponsors included Bulmers Light, Special K, Lipton Tea, Scotch Hall Shopping Centre, Arnotts and the Daily Mail's You Magazine.

In this Dutch-language version of the homonymous US format, with minor variations per season, Flemish and Dutch couples are split up to live in separate tropical islands resorts by gender, each joined by a group of attractive bachelors whose mission is to tempt them, if possible even to infidelity, in the course of various dates, parties and joint sleeping arrangements.

Daniel moves out to the suburbs and invites his Choppers to his house warming party. Will cultures clash when Daniel's new conservative suburban neighbors meet his motley crew from the Chop Shop? Meanwhile, Paymon, John, and Jeff put the fresh-faced new chopper Danny Lovelock through a good old-fashioned initiation process.

Follow two separate homeowners struggling to decorate their homes for the holidays. Frank Saslow of Oxnard, Calif., is desperate to convert his cool, palm tree-lined condo into a winter wonderland; while Matt Martin, of Tennessee, is determined to destroy his reputation as the neighborhood scrooge by turning his house into the envy of the block. Both Frank and Matt have limited DIY skills and the more they attempt to bling-out their homes for the holidays, the closer they come to a Christmas catastrophe.

Out of this world parties are not just for American teenagers so join MTV as My Super Sweet goes international for a brand new season of My Super Sweet World Class. These are some of the biggest, most extravagant events anyone has ever seen so get ready to party hard and run up the bill.

One of the wildest and most outrageous pawn shops in the country, the Cash Dome, run by Josh "White Boy" Gallander. From dealing with disruptive clientele to negotiating with housewives and businessmen, White Boy, his brother Josh and their overwhelmed dad certainly have their hands full.

Take a seat and hold on for an exclusive look inside the action-packed Gumball 3000 Super Car Rally. A relentless barrage of high-speed shenanigans, celebrity parties, super-cars, and nonstop action designed to push drivers to the edge. But don't be fooled: the stunts, breakdowns, cops and consequences are all very real on this 3000-mile pedal-to-the-metal celebration of speed!

Five single women and five single men, living in a luxurious mansion, seek for love. They are willing to do anything to conquer the Top Girl or the Top Boy. Every day, they will be evaluated by the Top Girl and the Top Boy, who at the end of every week select two men and two women for eviction.

College Lifestyle TV Series is a Jamaican production that focuses on Lifestyle, Entertainment, Travel, Career, Food, Extreme Sports, Campus Life with a underlying positive story-line, a celebration of the value of education and the excellence in our Caribbean people.

Alfie Placktis, a small town blue-collar kid turned flamboyant entrepreneur with a style all his own. From his first humble falafel stand at age 15, to multi-million dollar real estate developments, he barrels down paths that only a true entrepreneur can stomach. This fresh, playful format mixes a pair of young millennials with seasoned business pros, and sends the audience around the globe to meet colorful entrepreneurs, with the goal to finance their projects.

"Celebrity Sweat" is a behind the scenes look at the healthy lifestyles of your favorite athletes, actors, musicians, and fighters. It's a high energy, positive show that engages and inspires the viewer to change their lives and make the right decisions for optimal health and fitness.

The Zeno Supper Club is a social experiment to see what happens when you bring interesting people together with food, drink, and a creative environment. Through webisodes that are based on cooking lessons with "Top Chef" Lee Anne Wong, the Zeno Supper Club explores broader themes like environmental activism, buying local, living in a sustainable community and alternative transportation.

Sierra Boggess shows you around the Majestic Theater. Which is showing The Phantom Of The Opera. You meet the cast, her dad, her sister, and you get some Ramin Karimloo action! Daae days will make you laugh till your sides hurt. Sierra is an utter hoot!!!! And you get to see e the life of my role model as well as the best actress ever!!

Challenge All-Stars meet a new group of professional athletes, Olympic medalists, and entertainment high rollers in a high stakes competition all in the name of charity...and their own personal bragging rights. One contestant gets taken out of the show

13 strangers live in a house in Vienna. They have to lead a taxi company, and may use the money they earn with that. Except of that, they have no contact with the rest of the world (no newspapers, no TV, no radio). Every week one of the residents is voted off by a fellow resident, who was voted as winner of the week by the audience. The last one to remain in the house wins 1.000.000,-- ATS.

Making the Band ended with a bang last season as Diddy fired Aubrey and D Woods walked out. Our 60 minute special will feature commentary from the biggest MTB fans, media experts, Day 26, Donnie, Dawn, Aundrea and choreographer Laurie Ann Gibson about the events that led up to the explosive season ender and what we can expect for the new season while the future of platinum recording artists Danity Kane hangs in balance.

Tonight hippie Brodie is hosting a raw foods and 'wild flower' party, a theme that's nearly as ambiguous as her menu. Brodie is taking a few culinary risks tonight, but will her ambition be unbuttoned by some unruly guests and curious fire?

Kate Gosselin, her husband Jon, and their eight children have become increasingly famous in the last year. With swarms of paparazzi taking pictures of and filming their every move, and mountains of magazine articles about their lives and their marriage, Kate sits down with NBC's Natalie Morales for her most in-depth interview to date.
In every programme Jennifer Maguire descends on a different town around the country and hosts a Facebook flash mob date for three best friends.

Grammy-award winning producer, Stevie J, heads to LA on his own to produce his upcoming movie, That Time of the Month. Little does he know, his wife (and co-star) Joseline flew west as well. Will the husband-wife duo make amends to conquer Hollywood together?

Budding entrepreneurs, inventors and small businessmen (and women) pitch their ideas to the five "dragons" - real-life business leaders and millionaires, with real cash to invest in the companies they feel will make it. Each 'contestant' must convince the 'dragons' to part with thousands of pounds to make their dreams a reality.

Every year State Fair vendors try to top each other to create the most crazy, most delicious, most carb-loaded, over-the-top concoction ever, and fair-goers eat it up. From fried bubble gum, to casserole on a stick, to chocolate covered scorpions, State Fair foods are an adventure all their own and we'll take you along for the ride.

"The Film Room" joins many industry professionals each from different disciplines and fields of the entertainment industry mixing and mingling at a "Daiquiris and Crčme" daiquiri shop in New Orleans, LA. Those interested in one day joining the industry get the opportunity to interact and ask questions with the professionals awhile enjoying performance from local artists and comedians.

Bob and Ernie must split up their team as two hunters arrive in Kodiak. Meanwhile, Rob begins to recognize the reality of his father getting older. Rob must decide if he is going to follow in his father's footsteps and take over the family business.
Claire Brennen stars as a waitress who leaves the greasy-diner business for the excitement of the carnival. She quickly discovers that she despises freaks and human oddities.

After being pushed to the edge by grief and a persistent poacher, Samuel Waring, a Peak Park Ranger slips into psychotic madness. Two photography students photographing the Peak District upset him, which leads him to kidnap them along with the poacher. They are never seen again.

The series was produced by TVW-7 Perth with the first show aired in 1961. The show went out live, as TVW-7 did not acquired videotape facilities until 1962. Other regional TV stations would later produce their own "Aweful Movies with Deadly Earnest".

In "Whisper of Death", five teenagers awaken one morning to find themselves alone and trapped within their small remote hometown, once full of life, but now completely lifeless. Having only casual connections to one another, they soon realize their one common acquaintance was a socially withdrawn class mate, a girl who had recently committed her own horrendous suicide.

A group of 5 ghost hunters decide to explore an old haunted insane asylum in a large Victorian house in Prescott Arizona. The house manifests anything that you think of creating some interesting scenes. Up stairs is mostly paranormal activity and downstairs is mostly serial killers.
